steps.step: Turn your head to the left to avoid being choked while you grab your opponent's right wrist with your right hand.
Execute a horse-bite pinch to your opponent's left upper-inner thigh.
Allow your opponent to release you from the headlock while maintaining your grip on their right wrist.
Stand up to a forward bow while executing a upward elbow to your opponent's right tricep.
step toward 12:00 into a neutral bow while executing a hammering inward to your opponent's right elbow. Simultaneously pull their right wrist to your right hip with your right hand.
pivot into a forward bow while executing a vertical reverse punch to your opponent's right ear. Simultaneously pin your opponent's right arm to your stomach with your right hand.
